name: enclosed
description: Enclosed is a self-hosted paste and snippet service with an emphasis on encryption and privacy. Users can store text or code snippets and share links while keeping control of retention and access.
features: Encrypted Snippets: Store text and code with strong encryption. Maximum privacy protection.
Secure Sharing: Share links with controlled access. Protected snippet distribution.
Retention Control: Set custom expiration times for pastes. Automatic cleanup.
Code Highlighting: Syntax highlighting for multiple languages. Developer-friendly display.
Privacy-First: No tracking or unnecessary data collection. Your snippets stay private.
Self-Hosted: Run your own paste service. Complete ownership and control.
